page.title: 10Why we moved to Darras Hall
page.content:
{"Reasons for moving to Darras Hall" Survey-Class 5 ...........29 children Father obtained job nearby.........19 Impressed with local schools.......14 Wanted a bigger garden.............12 Wanted bigger or nicer house........8 Near to countryside.................7 Pleasant area.......................5 Liked wide choice of bungalows......2
{Survey...parents.....Sample size..200
Educational facilities.........140 Larger garden..................132 Larger house...................112 Easy access to work............110 Near to relations/friends.......20
50% had lived here less than 5 years 10% had lived here more than 15 years
-
